attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: I downloaded this app just to be asked if I wanted to turn notifications on, like.... pushy much?? Then I was greeted with a horribly edited picture of an Oompa Loompa looking man with a corn husk on his head who looks racist. Then it TOLD me to put in my phone number. First of all, I do not appreciate being told what to do because I am a strong woman who does not listen to rapists. Secondly, that is a huge violation of privacy. Might as well ask for my social security number with the amount of times they would try to spam my phone! I would NOT recommend this app and if I could, I would give it ZERO stars.

attributes.title: would not recommend
attributes.review: As soon as I opened this app it deleted every single one of my pictures, contacts, apps, and reasons to live, and it took up all my data and storage. Ever since then I've been receiving countless spam calls, texts, and emails from foreign countries about Herbal Viagra. I tried to speak with customer support but they keep saying "No one's home." I guess I can't complain too much, a friend of mine also downloaded it and as soon as they opened it their phone exploded. Customer support isn't listening to them either. Don't download this app, it's not worth it.

attributes.title: No❤️
attributes.review: When I opened the app I saw a giant Cheeto looking straight into my soul. I thought nothing of it and went on with my day. The next day the app started glitching and I heard the voice of the giant Cheeto he told me to go to trump towers so I did when I got there I was greeted by the roaches from behind the counter and they told me to go up to the top floor when I got there the Cheeto was there and he told me that he need help fixing the app I said no❤️ and then my phone opened the app and drop kicked me back to my house when I got there all the rats had moved in and there was Cheeto dust everywhere basically this app ruined my life

This app is so disgusting I opened it and the first thing I saw was a feather less bird dancing! Then when I tried to get out of it, it gave me a virus smh. After that it showed me a video of a scary old man who said he had my information. Once I clicked out of that it then showed me a video of a pig being forced to dance to the macarana the poor thing was defenseless!!!!! But on top of all of that they my phone got hacked and now it’s playing random songs over and over again! I’ve been writing this for 7hrs because the virus it gave me won’t allow me to be on an app for more than 10 seconds!!!!!!!!!!!!

attributes.title: this ain’t it chile...
attributes.review: Right after using this app my fridge went missing along with my whole family. All my food and house is gone. I DO NOT recommend using this because they’ll steal your kidneys in your sleep and will steal your whole house and house valuables. For some reason a walking Cheeto came into my house and stole ALL OF MY MONEY. He said “you better rate this 5 stars or I’ll harvest your organs” I refused and decided to call my dog over to bite his balls off. I splashed water on him and all the orange on his face drooped down onto the ground. He looks like a greasy salamander🤮. It was a VERY scary experience. WORST APP EVER. This app ruined my life!
attributes.userName: m i l k & h o n e yt e a

attributes.title: ✨🧚🏼‍♂️BE AWARE🧚🏻✨
attributes.review: 🧚🏻✨🤧downloading this app was a tragedy. My 69 cats awoke me in the middle of the night singing the lyrics to “💅Shawdys like a melody💅” while violently shaking. 💀not long after that something even MORE odd😱 happened... 👺the shrubs in my garden turned into Cheetos and started speaking nonsense 🤐👽 they broke into my house and chanted in a low voice, 🦾 “Cheeto 2020 ᗷᑌᴛ ɪᑎ 𝓪 ɢʀᗩᴠᗴ✌️😜" at this point I was terrified👁👄👁 the only thing I could do was find shelter so I went to the only place I could think of🥺 Mexico 🇲🇽 where I stayed with a nice family that made me some fried rat with a side of “✨💅black lives matter, equality, and a new president ✨🧚🏼‍♂️!”

attributes.title: Absolutely not❤️
attributes.review: Why in the world do I open this app to find out there is no app!!! there’s just an app but this app isn’t the app, they made the app since the app is the app to bring to the app out of the app...yeah the app?!?! BUT WHAT ABOUT THE APP?!?! In the app when you turn off the app in the app appity app, but yeah, look it’s just the app without an app...to notice but not to realize anything about this app...turn off this app with an app please✨ Oh must I beg you app!!! app app app...Then with what an app, must an app do? Just be lonely app...no app, all apps matter, not this app, no no no...just others:) Apps....LIKE APPS APPS...yeah now apps sounds weird to me:( APPPPPPPPPP?!??? yeah❤️but not this one✨💕🔥

attributes.title: this is disgusting.🙅‍♀️🙅‍♀️🙅‍♀️
attributes.review: How do i even start?!?!? 😰I open this app expecting to find some great information about what goes on with today society.🤨To find a fat orange potato peel on my screen.😨🤮 I was horrified and still can’t get that image out of my head.🤢 Just looking at this boy made me fall EXTREMELY ill and ended up having to get CPR.🤒The medical bills were so high i was forced to become homeless all because of this sick little cheeto. 😵😪And the best part is that is isn’t the first time!😧 This has happened to FAMILY and the people I CARE about.😞 So please for the sake of you and your loved ones DO NOT get this app.😿😾😾

attributes.title: THIS IS CHINESE SPYWARE!!!!!!!!
attributes.review: I’m horrified after downloading this app! I expected to be updated on what my lord and savior the big Cheeto had to say but instead I was greeted with all these pop ups asking for my bank account, phone number, social security number, mother’s maiden name, and address. I’m convinced this app is chinese spyware used to access the personal data of the American citizens, I cannot stand for this! I’ve never been so appalled in my life, DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP IF YOU DONT WANT CHINESE SPYWARE MESSING WITH YOUR DEVICE!!!! I cannot believe this app has stayed on the apple store for so long it needs to be deleted immediately for the safety of its customers 😡😡😤😤

attributes.title: Inconsistent News from this app! VERY DISAPPOINTED
attributes.review: I downloaded this app because it was rated highly on the news section in the apple store. I was sorely disappointed to find out that it was a campaign propaganda machine. Did you know that the Trump Organization did not allow  employees to admit colored people (specifically African Americans) into their hotels before they were caught in 1973? Did you know Trump blames another country for his poor handling of COVID-19, despite claiming he was well prepared and not worried back in March. He’s a lying, racist crybaby with an app that works horribly. Please do you research  and whatever you do, don’t download this app.
